title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Maintain high alert today because you and those around you are prone to hypersensitivity or dramatic reactions. Defensive behavior is likely while receptivity is low. Slowing your response time enables you to be a counter-agent if you think someone else is acting aggressively or suspiciously. Fortunately, you dont have to fight fire with fire even if others do; you can consciously choose to remain emotionally centered, instead. Stop heated exchanges from getting hotter by using your watery compassion and thoughtfulness. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. said, Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
